name: Color Jam (alexysxs)
description:
For the GMTK 2021 Game Jam! 

CONTROLS:

Left Mouse Button - Pick up item (Buttons) / Drop item (after clicking)
Right Mouse Button - Remove item (Added back to button)

Up & Down Arrow Keys - Speed Up/ Down rotating platforms

Reset Button - Top Left 

My first construct game, more to come!

Made in under 6 hours.
